contents:
12 Prosecutors: Ex-Hochul Aide Spied for China, CCP Paid Her Enough to Buy Mansion, Ferrari, Condo in Hawaii (www.breitbart.com) 🖕   FUCK  CHINA   🖕 posted 41 minutes ago by TEXinLA 2 comments award share report block Prosecutors: Ex-Hochul Aide Used CCP Kickbacks for Mansion, Ferrari Linda Sun enjoyed a lavish lifestyle and millions in kickbacks working as an undeclared agent for China, federal prosecutors claim. www.breitbart.com
2 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save TEXinLA OP 1 points 41 minutes ago From the article: During Sun’s trial on Monday, prosecutors alleged that she earned a government salary of $145,000 but received millions of dollars in side deals orchestrated by Chinese officials. Per a Wall Street Journal report, Sun and her husband, Chris Hu, 42, used their alleged ill-gotten gains to buy a $3.6 million mansion in Long Island, a $1.9 million condo in Hawaii, and a 2024 Ferrari Roma worth $243,300. permalink award report block reply RoninIV 1 points 35 minutes ago Next, find out how much the CCP is paying Hochul. permalink award report block reply
TEXinLA OP 1 points 41 minutes ago From the article: During Sun’s trial on Monday, prosecutors alleged that she earned a government salary of $145,000 but received millions of dollars in side deals orchestrated by Chinese officials. Per a Wall Street Journal report, Sun and her husband, Chris Hu, 42, used their alleged ill-gotten gains to buy a $3.6 million mansion in Long Island, a $1.9 million condo in Hawaii, and a 2024 Ferrari Roma worth $243,300. permalink award report block reply
